onTokenize(String, Map<String, TokenType>) - Method in class de.mrapp.textmining.util.tokenizer.AbstractTokenizer
The method, which is invoked on subclasses in order to tokenize a specific text.

OptimalStringAlignmentDissimilarity - Class in de.mrapp.textmining.util.metrics
Optimal string alignment dissimilarity (abbreviated as OSA dissimilarity) is the loss metric pendant to the OptimalStringAlignmentDistance.
OptimalStringAlignmentDissimilarity() - Constructor for class de.mrapp.textmining.util.metrics.OptimalStringAlignmentDissimilarity
 
OptimalStringAlignmentDistance - Class in de.mrapp.textmining.util.metrics
Allows to calculate the distance between texts according to the optimal string alignment distance (abbreviated as OSA distance, also referred to as "restricted edit distance" or "restricted Damerau-Levenshtein distance").
OptimalStringAlignmentDistance() - Constructor for class de.mrapp.textmining.util.metrics.OptimalStringAlignmentDistance
 
OptimalStringAlignmentSimilarity - Class in de.mrapp.textmining.util.metrics
Optimal string alignment similarity (abbreviated as OSA similarity) is the gain metric pendant to the OptimalStringAlignmentDistance.
OptimalStringAlignmentSimilarity() - Constructor for class de.mrapp.textmining.util.metrics.OptimalStringAlignmentSimilarity
